title: Socket-outlets
fullText:
All fixed socket-outlets protected by an LPD that are to be used to supply medical electrical equipment shall be identified 'SUITABLE FOR MEDICAL USE'.
NOTE: This identification requirement need not apply where a Type 1, 10 mA portable or in line RCD, or a PSOA in accordance with Clause 5.2.3.1(iii), is being used.
Socket-outlets other than those installed for the supply of medical electrical equipment do not require LPD protection, but shall be protected by an RCD having a rated residual current not exceeding 30 mA, installed in accordance with AS/NZS 3000.
